trans-unit.source: Defines properties that enables sorting, grouping, and filtering on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> in real time.
trans-unit.target: 定义能够使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 排序，分组和筛选的属性。

trans-unit.source: When live sorting, grouping, or filtering is enabled, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> will rearrange the position of data in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> when the data is modified.
trans-unit.target: 当实时排序、 分组或启用了筛选，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>将重新排列中的数据的位置<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>时修改的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to list stocks in a stock market and the stocks are sorted by stock value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设应用程序使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>若要列出在股票市场 stocks stocks 按和进行排序股票值。

trans-unit.source: If live sorting is enabled on the stocks' <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>, a stock's position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> moves when the value of the stock becomes greater or less than another stock's value.
trans-unit.target: 如果对 stocks 的启用了实时排序<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>中的常用的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>移动时常用的值将成为大于或小于另一个股票的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> classes implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>类实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class also implements the properties defined by <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping> to enable setting the properties in XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>类还可实现由定义的属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping>若要启用在 XAML 中设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface on your custom <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> to support sorting, grouping, and filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 在您的自定义实现此接口<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>以支持排序、 分组和筛选实时数据。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement the sorting, grouping, and filtering operations itself, or you can delegate one or more of them to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现的排序、 分组和筛选操作本身，也可以委派一个或多个到另一个对象，例如基础集合。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate the shaping operations, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether live shaping is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托调整操作，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用实时调整。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the appropriate **CanChange*** properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置相应的**CanChange*** 属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live shaping, it can set the appropriate `IsLive`* properties to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否将委托对象支持实时调整，它可以设置相应`IsLive`* 为已知值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> should set the `IsLive`* properties to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>应设置`IsLive`* 属性设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning filtering data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合视图是否支持打开或关闭实时筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection view supports turning live filtering on or off; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合视图支持打开或关闭实时筛选，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live filtering itself, or you can delegate live filtering to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现实时筛选本身，或你可以委托到另一个对象，例如基础集合的实时筛选。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live filtering, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托实时筛选<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用它。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.CanChangeLiveFiltering%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.CanChangeLiveFiltering%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning grouping data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合视图是否支持在真实时间中打开或关闭分组数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection view supports turning live grouping on or off; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合视图支持旋转的实时分组开关，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live grouping itself, or you can delegate live grouping to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现实时分组本身，或你可以委托到另一个对象，例如基础集合的实时分组。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live grouping, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托实时分组<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用它。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.CanChangeLiveGrouping%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.CanChangeLiveGrouping%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning sorting data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合视图是否支持在真实时间中打开或关闭排序数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection view supports turning live sorting on or off; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合视图支持旋转的实时排序开关，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live sorting itself, or you can delegate live sorting to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现实时排序本身，或你可以委托到另一个对象，例如基础集合的实时排序。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托实时排序<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用它。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.CanChangeLiveSorting%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.CanChangeLiveSorting%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering data in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用实时筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if filtering data in real time is enabled; <see langword="false" /> if live filtering is not enabled; <see langword="null" /> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live filtering.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用实时筛选数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果未启用活动筛选，则为 <see langword="false" />；如果不能确定集合视图是否实现活动筛选，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live filtering itself, or you can delegate live filtering to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现实时筛选本身，或你可以委托到另一个对象，例如基础集合的实时筛选。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live filtering, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托实时筛选<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用它。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live filtering, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveFiltering%2A> property to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否支持实时筛选，该委托对象设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveFiltering%2A>为已知值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, set <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveFiltering%2A> to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveFiltering%2A>到`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grouping data in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用实时数据分组。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if grouping data in real time is enable; <see langword="false" /> if live grouping is not enabled; <see langword="null" /> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live grouping.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用实时分组数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果未启用活动分组，则为 <see langword="false" />；如果不能确定集合视图是否实现活动分组，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live grouping itself, or you can delegate live grouping to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现实时分组本身，或你可以委托到另一个对象，例如基础集合的实时分组。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live grouping, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托实时分组<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用它。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live grouping, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveGrouping%2A> property to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否支持实时分组，将委托对象设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveGrouping%2A>为已知值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, set <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveGrouping%2A> to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveGrouping%2A>到`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether sorting in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用实时排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if sorting data in real time is enable; <see langword="false" /> if live sorting is not enabled; <see langword="null" /> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live sorting.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用实时排序数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果未启用活动排序，则为 <see langword="false" />；如果不能确定集合视图是否实现活动排序，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Notes for Inheritors
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的说明

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> can implement live sorting itself, or you can delegate live sorting to another object, such as the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可以实现实时排序本身，或你可以委托到另一个对象，例如基础集合的实时排序。

trans-unit.source: If you delegate live sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> might not have control over whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托实时排序<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>可能没有控制是否启用它。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> must accept the behavior of the object to which it delegates.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>必须接受它将委托对象的行为。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> knows whether the delegate object supports live sorting, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveSorting%2A> property to the known value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>知道是否支持实时排序，将委托对象设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveSorting%2A>为已知值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, set <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveSorting%2A> to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewLiveShaping.IsLiveSorting%2A>到`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 获取在真实时间中参与筛选数据的属性的字符集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定参与真实时间中的筛选数据的属性的字符集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in grouping data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 获取在真实时间中参与分组数据的属性的字符集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in grouping data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定参与真实时间中的分组数据的属性的字符集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in sorting data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 获取在真实时间中参与排序数据的属性的字符集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in sorting data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定参与真实时间中的排序数据的属性的字符集合。
